law.catch_line: An applicant for initial registration shall:...

text.section:
The registration application shall include the following information:
the name, business address, and telephone number of the premium finance company; and
the name and business address of each officer, director, principal, and partner of the premium finance company.
A registration application may require the applicant to disclose the identity, trade names, and names of managers and owners of the applicant.
